it.polimi.se2018.model

Class PrivateObjectiveCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.ObjectiveCard
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.PrivateObjectiveCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PrivateObjectiveCard
extends ObjectiveCard
    Represents Private Objective Cards. Each private objective card has a different color.
    Author:
    Jacopo Pio Gargano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore(WindowPattern windowPattern)
        Calculates the score of a given window pattern according this objective card (scoring depends only on card's color). The score is achieved by scoring each cell on the window pattern.
        Specified by:
        calculateScore in class ObjectiveCard
        Parameters:
        windowPattern - the windowPattern to evaluate
        Returns:
        the score of a given window pattern according the private objective card
